__NOTOC__ str '''GetActorClass''' (int ''tid'');
==Usage== Retrieves the class name of an actor with the specified [[TID|tid]]. If tid is 0, it retrieves the class name of the activator of the script.
===Parameters=== *''tid'': The tid of the actor to retrieve its class name.
===Return Value=== Returns the class name of the actor as a string.
==Examples== This is the same example from [[CheckActorClass#Examples|this]] function, only much simpler. script 1 (int tid) { [[PrintBold]](s:"Look out for the ", s:'''GetActorClass'''(tid), s:"!"); }
==See also== * [[CheckActorClass]]
